title: 70. Fireside with the Underboss - "He Was Trained To Kill In The Military. He Knew What He Was Doing"
description: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano shares about Nino Gaggi's nephew, Dominick Montiglio who passed away on June 27th, 2021. Sammy's childhood friend implicated himself when he raised his hands to a made guy.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
